name: Double Dodge
description:
Control with the Arrow-keys and swap the viewport by pressing SPACE

Hello friend. I have created other games - see them here corpas.nu

Also, if you would like to get yourself on the leaderboards, head over to the page for this game on corpas.nu/double-dodge

If you think the game is worth anything and you'd like to support me, that is much appreciated :)

Whatever you do, I hope you enjoy the game!

Any questions or issues can be submitted to me by email: gustav@corpas.nu
